alert.note: Alert for Yukon Flats and Surrounding Uplands (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued August 08 at 4:51AM AKDT until August 09 at 12:00AM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT AKDT TONIGHT FOR LIGHTNING FOR YUKON FLATS AND SURROUNDING UPLANDS... The National Weather Service in Fairbanks has issued a Red Flag Warning for lightning, which is in effect until midnight AKDT tonight. * AFFECTED AREA...Yukon Flats and Surrounding Uplands. * TIMING...Until midnight AKDT tonight. * LIGHTNING ACTIVITY LEVEL...4. * WINDS...West 5 to 10 mph. * HUMIDITY...As low as 20 percent. * TEMPERATURES...Highs in the low to mid 80s. * IMPACTS...Frequent lightning could cause new fire starts. Thunderstorms will cause gusty and erratic winds.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that conditions are occurring or will occur which could lead to the development of large and dangerous fires. It is directed toward fire agencies, and through them, to the public. Please advise the appropriate officials or fire crews in the field of this Red Flag Warning.
